00026    class DecodedData;
00027    namespace Codec {
00028       class WAV : virtual public AbstractCodec {
00029          public:
00030             WAV ( void );
00031             virtual ~WAV ( void );
00032 
00033          // virtual
00034             virtual bool init ( std::string inputfile, std::string idObj );
00035             virtual bool play ( std::string id );
00036             virtual unsigned long int getSeek ( void ) const;
00037             virtual void setSeek ( double val );
00038             virtual void flush ( void );
00039          private:
00040             class WavInfo {
00041                public:
00042 //                      WavInfo ( void );
00043 //                ~WavInfo ( void ) { std::cout << "WavInfo Destructor.. " << std::endl; }
00044 
00045                   std::string getChunkID ( void ) {
00046                      std::string dest;
00047                      for ( unsigned short int i = 0; i != 4; ++i ) {
00048                         dest += ChunkID [ i ];
00049                      }
00050                      return dest;
00051                   }
00052 
00053                   int getChunkSize ( void ) { return ( this -> ChunkSize ); }
00054 
00055                   std::string getFormat ( void ) {
00056                      std::string dest;
00057                      for ( unsigned short int i = 0; i != 4; ++i ) {
00058                         dest += Format [ i ];
00059                      }
00060                      return dest;
00061                   }
00062 
00063                   std::string getSubchunk1ID ( void ) {
00064                      std::string dest;
00065                      for ( unsigned short int i = 0; i != 4; ++i ) {
00066                         dest += Subchunk1ID [ i ];
00067                      }
00068                      return dest;
00069                   }
00070 
00071                   int getSubchunk1Size ( void ) { return ( this -> Subchunk1Size ); }
00072                   int getAudioFormat ( void ) { return ( this -> AudioFormat ); }
00073                   int getNumChannels ( void ) { return ( this -> NumChannels ); }
00074                   int getSampleRate ( void ) { return ( this -> SampleRate ); }
00075                   int getByteRate ( void ) { return ( this -> ByteRate ); }
00076                   int getBlockAlign ( void ) { return ( this -> BlockAlign ); }
00077                   int getBitsPerSample ( void ) { return ( this -> BitsPerSample ); }
00078 
00079                   std::string getSubchunk2ID ( void ) {
00080                      std::string dest;
00081                      for ( unsigned short int i = 0; i != 4; ++i ) {
00082                         dest += Subchunk2ID [ i ];
00083                      }
00084                      return dest;
00085                   }
00086 
00087                   int getSubchunk2Size ( void ) { return ( this -> Subchunk2Size ); }
00088                private:
00089          /*
00090                   bit - бит         0 или 1
00091                   byte - байт       8 бит
00092                   kbit - 10e3
00093          */
00094 //      == RIFF ==
00095         
00096 //      WAVE
00097 //      Contains the letters "RIFF" in ASCII form
00098 //      (0x52494646 big-endian form)
00099                   char ChunkID [ 4 ];
00100                   int32_t ChunkSize; // размер "wav" файла целиком
00101 //      Contains the letters "WAVE"
00102 //      (0x57415645 big-endian form)
00103                   char Format [ 4 ];
00104                 
00105 //      fmt
00106                   char Subchunk1ID [ 4 ];
00107                   int32_t Subchunk1Size;
00108 //      PCM = 1 (i.e. Linear quantization)
00109 //      Values other than 1 indicate some form of compression.
00110                   int16_t AudioFormat;
00111                   int16_t NumChannels; // Mono = 1, Stereo = 2, etc.
00112                   int32_t SampleRate; // 8000, 44100, etc.
00113                   int32_t ByteRate; // SampleRate * NumChannels * BitsPerSample (kbit/s)
00114 //      == NumChannels * BitsPerSample/8
00115 //      The number of bytes for one sample including all channels
00116                   int16_t BlockAlign;
00117                   int16_t BitsPerSample; // 8 bits = 8, 16 bits = 16, etc.
00118 
00119 //      data
00120                   char Subchunk2ID [ 4 ];
00121                   int32_t Subchunk2Size; // размер аудио-данных ( pcm )
00122             };
